mapper.sql: ks_kssj, ks_yyjb, ks_xh, ks_zf, ks_qk, ks_wj, ks_xymc, ks_zymc, ks_nj, ks_bjmc
mapper.select: select from CET_STUSCORE cetStuscore where id = #{id}
select distinct ks_kssj from CET_STUSCORE cetStuscore order by ks_kssj desc

select xsm as academy, zym as major, substr(dqnj,3,2) as grade, bjh as classes, count(*) as schoolNumber from xs_xjxxb_view_kw
SFYXJ = '是'
and dqnj not in (${grade})
and xsm not in (${academy})
and zym not in (${major})
and dqnj not in (${classes})
group by xsm,zym,dqnj,bjh order by bjh

select ks_yyjb as langType, ks_xymc as academy, ks_zymc as major, ks_nj as grade, ks_bjmc as classes, count(*) as baseNumber from cet_stuscore left join xs_xjxxb_view_kw on xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh = cet_stuscore.ks_xh
xs_xjxxb_view_kw.SFYXJ = '是'
and dqnj not in (${grade})
and xsm not in (${academy})
and zym not in (${major})
and dqnj not in (${classes})
and ks_kssj in (${examDate})
and ks_yyjb in (${langType})
group by ks_yyjb,ks_xymc,ks_zymc,ks_nj,ks_bjmc order by ks_yyjb

select ks_yyjb as langType, ks_xymc as academy, ks_zymc as major, ks_nj as grade, ks_bjmc as classes, count(*) as missingNumber from cet_stuscore left join xs_xjxxb_view_kw on xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh = cet_stuscore.ks_xh
xs_xjxxb_view_kw.SFYXJ = '是' and ks_qk = '缺考'
and dqnj not in (${grade})
and xsm not in (${academy})
and zym not in (${major})
and dqnj not in (${classes})
and ks_kssj in (${examDate})
and ks_yyjb in (${langType})
group by ks_yyjb,ks_xymc,ks_zymc,ks_nj,ks_bjmc order by ks_yyjb

select ks_yyjb as langType, ks_xymc as academy, ks_zymc as major, ks_nj as grade, ks_bjmc as classes, count(*) as passNumber from cet_stuscore left join xs_xjxxb_view_kw on xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh = cet_stuscore.ks_xh
xs_xjxxb_view_kw.SFYXJ = '是' and ks_zf >= 425
and dqnj not in (${grade})
and xsm not in (${academy})
and zym not in (${major})
and dqnj not in (${classes})
and ks_kssj in (${examDate})
and ks_yyjb in (${langType})
group by ks_yyjb,ks_xymc,ks_zymc,ks_nj,ks_bjmc order by ks_yyjb

select ks_yyjb as langType, ks_xymc as academy, ks_zymc as major, ks_nj as grade, ks_bjmc as classes, round(avg(ks_zf),2) as avgScore from cet_stuscore left join xs_xjxxb_view_kw on xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh = cet_stuscore.ks_xh
xs_xjxxb_view_kw.SFYXJ = '是'
and dqnj not in (${grade})
and xsm not in (${academy})
and zym not in (${major})
and dqnj not in (${classes})
and ks_kssj in (${examDate})
and ks_yyjb in (${langType})
group by ks_yyjb,ks_xymc,ks_zymc,ks_nj,ks_bjmc order by ks_yyjb

select ks_yyjb as langType, ks_xymc as academy, ks_zymc as major, ks_nj as grade, ks_bjmc as classes, max(ks_zf) as maxScore from cet_stuscore left join xs_xjxxb_view_kw on xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh = cet_stuscore.ks_xh
xs_xjxxb_view_kw.SFYXJ = '是'
and dqnj not in (${grade})
and xsm not in (${academy})
and zym not in (${major})
and dqnj not in (${classes})
and ks_kssj in (${examDate})
and ks_yyjb in (${langType})
group by ks_yyjb,ks_xymc,ks_zymc,ks_nj,ks_bjmc order by ks_yyjb

select ks_kssj as ksKssj, ks_yyjb as ksYyjb, ks_xh as ksXh, ks_zf as ksZf, ks_qk as ksQk, ks_wj as ksWj, ks_xymc as ksXymc, ks_zymc as ksZymc, ks_nj as ksNj, ks_bjmc as ksBjmc, xm as ksXm, xb as ksXb, sfzh as ksSfzh from cet_stuscore left join xs_xjxxb_view_kw on xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xh = cet_stuscore.ks_xh
and cet_stuscore.ks_yyjb = #{ksYyjb}
and xs_xjxxb_view_kw.xm like concat('%',concat(#{ksXm},'%'))
and cet_stuscore.ks_xh like concat('%',concat(#{ksXh},'%'))
mapper.insert:
insert into CET_STUSCORE
ks_kssj,
ks_yyjb,
ks_xh,
ks_zf,
ks_qk,
ks_wj,
ks_xymc,
ks_zymc,
ks_nj,
ks_bjmc
#{ksKssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ksYyjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ksXh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ksZf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ksQk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ksWj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ksXymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ksZymc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ksNj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ksBjmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update CET_STUSCORE cetStuscore
ks_kssj = #{ksKssj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ks_yyjb = #{ksYyjb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ks_xh = #{ksXh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ks_zf = #{ksZf,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ks_qk = #{ksQk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id= #{id}
update CET_STUSCORE cetStuscore set deleted=1 where id=#{id}
update CET_STUSCORE cetStuscore set deleted=1 where id=#{id}
